text: @AnnieWellsMSP Would you, honestly, willingly go into your (I believe) previous work, @marksandspencer, against scientific advice, just because of your political belief? I seriously doubt it. So why ask others to do the very same? Covid19 doesn't stop at the glass door at the front of the shop
